definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
palace/temple/castration (as corporal punishment)/first note in pentatonic scale

sentences.english: What play will be performed tonight at the Palace of Culture?
sentences.chinese: 今晚在文化宮會上演哪個戲目？

sentences.english: Originally Ancestral Temple, People's Cultural Palace is National major cultural relics preservation unit.
sentences.chinese: 勞動人民文化宮原爲太廟，爲全國重點文物保護單位。

sentences.english: The copper ceiling of the National Culture Palace hall is made by our factory.
sentences.chinese: 這是我廠爲民族文化宮大廳製作的銅鏨花吊頂。

sentences.english: Of the hostage-taking incident in Moscow's Cultural Palace Theater bearing factory.
sentences.chinese: 發生劫持人質事件的莫斯科的軸承廠文化宮劇院。

definition: Nankai district of Tianjin municipality 天津市[Tian1 jin1 shi4]
Children's Palace, institution where children can take part in various extracurricular activities
Harbin, subprovincial city and capital of Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1] in northeast China
Hanyuan county in Ya'an 雅安[Ya3 an1], Sichuan
Haidian inner district of northeast Beijing, includes Peking University, Tsinghua University 清華大學|清华大学[Qing1 hua2 da4 xue2] and Zhongguancun 中關村|中关村[Zhong1 guan1 cun1]
Jianhe county in Qiandongnan Miao and Dong autonomous prefecture 黔東南州|黔东南州[Qian2 dong1 nan2 zhou1], Guizhou
